languages.text: {n}Кибелла недоуменно хмурится.{/n} "Неумирающий Император и есть смерть. Мы служим Ему, а значит, мы служим смерти. Это не сравнение, не титул, не прихоть. Так есть. И никто не в силах изменить неизменное".
{n}Kibellah frowns.{/n} "The Undying One is death itself. We serve Him, and thus we serve death. This is not a comparison, attribution, or preference. It is the truth... and nothing can change it."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла недоуменно хмурится.{/n} "Неумирающий Император и есть смерть. Мы служим Ему, а значит, мы служим смерти. Это не сравнение, не титул, не прихоть. Так есть. И никто не в силах изменить неизменное".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah frowns.{/n} "The Undying One is death itself. We serve Him, and thus we serve death. There is no comparison, attribution, or whim. This is how it is. And none can change the immutable."
{n}Kibellah frowns.{/n} "The Undying One is death itself. We serve Him, and thus we serve death. There is no comparison, attribution, or whim. This is how it is. And none can change the immutable."

{n}Kibellah frowns.{/n} "The Undying One is death itself. We serve Him, and thus we serve death. This is not a comparison, attribution, or whimsical fancy. It is the truth... and nothing can change it."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah frunce el ceño.{/n} «El Inmortal es la muerte misma. Nosotros le servimos, y por tanto servimos a la muerte. No se trata de una comparación, una atribución ni una preferencia. Es simple y llanamente la verdad... y nada puede cambiarla».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah frowns.{/n} "The Undying One is death itself. We serve Him, and thus we serve death. This is not a comparison, attribution, or preference. It is the truth... and nothing can change it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah frunce el ceño.{/n} «El Inmortal es la muerte misma. Nosotros le servimos, y por tanto servimos a la muerte. No se trata de una comparación, una atribución ni una preferencia. Es simple y llanamente la verdad... y nada puede cambiarla».

languages.text: {n}キベラが顔をしかめる。{/n}「不死の者は死そのものよ。私たちは主に仕え、そうすることで死に仕える。これは比較でも、属性でも、嗜好でもない。真実であり…何物にも変えることはできない」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah frowns.{/n} "The Undying One is death itself. We serve Him, and thus we serve death. This is not a comparison, attribution, or preference. It is the truth... and nothing can change it."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラが顔をしかめる。{/n}「不死の者は死そのものよ。私たちは主に仕え、そうすることで死に仕える。これは比較でも、属性でも、嗜好でもない。真実であり…何物にも変えることはできない」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈皱起了眉头。{/n}“不死之神就是死亡本身。我们侍奉祂，就是在侍奉死亡。这并不是类比、比喻，或是别的什么修辞手法，这就是事实……这一点无可改变。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah frowns.{/n} "The Undying One is death itself. We serve Him, and thus we serve death. This is not a comparison, attribution, or preference. It is the truth... and nothing can change it."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈皱起了眉头。{/n}“不死之神就是死亡本身。我们侍奉祂，就是在侍奉死亡。这并不是类比、比喻，或是别的什么修辞手法，这就是事实……这一点无可改变。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Der Todlose ist der Tod selbst. Wir dienen Ihm, und dadurch dienen wir dem Tod. Das ist kein Vergleich, keine Zuschreibung, keine Vorliebe. Es ist die Wahrheit ... und nichts kann daran etwas ändern."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah frowns.{/n} "The Undying One is death itself. We serve Him, and thus we serve death. This is not a comparison, attribution, or preference. It is the truth... and nothing can change it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Der Todlose ist der Tod selbst. Wir dienen Ihm, und dadurch dienen wir dem Tod. Das ist kein Vergleich, keine Zuschreibung, keine Vorliebe. Es ist die Wahrheit ... und nichts kann daran etwas ändern."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah se renfrogne.{/n} « L'Immortel est la mort elle-même. En Le servant, c'est la mort que nous servons. Ce n'est ni une comparaison, ni une affectation, ni une préférence. C'est la vérité sans fard... et rien ne peut changer cet état de fait. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah frowns.{/n} "The Undying One is death itself. We serve Him, and thus we serve death. This is not a comparison, attribution, or preference. It is the truth... and nothing can change it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah se renfrogne.{/n} « L'Immortel est la mort elle-même. En Le servant, c'est la mort que nous servons. Ce n'est ni une comparaison, ni une affectation, ni une préférence. C'est la vérité sans fard... et rien ne peut changer cet état de fait. »

languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah frowns.{/n} "The Undying One is death itself. We serve Him, and thus we serve death. This is not a comparison, attribution, or preference. It is the truth... and nothing can change it."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Ölmeyen, ölümün ta kendisidir. Bizler O'na hizmet ederiz, böylece ölüme hizmet etmiş oluruz. Bu bir benzetme, niteleme veya tercih meselesi değil. Hakikatin ta kendisi... Bunu değiştirmek de mümkün değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah frowns.{/n} "The Undying One is death itself. We serve Him, and thus we serve death. This is not a comparison, attribution, or preference. It is the truth... and nothing can change it."
